mapper.select: select * from t_admin where email=#{email} and password = #{password} and status = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into t_admin(id, email, password, name, phone, role) values(uuid(), #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{role})
mapper.update: update t_admin set status = 'N' where id = #{id}
update t_admin set status = 'Y' where id = #{id}
update t_admin set last_login_time = login_time, login_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
update t_admin set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
update t_admin set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
